descs:
Grumpig uses the black pearls on its body to wield
its fantastic powers. When it is doing so, it dances bizarrely.
This Pokémon's black pearls are valuable as works of art.

Grumpig uses the black pearls on its body to amplify its
psychic power waves for gaining total control over its foe.
When this Pokémon uses its special power, its snorting breath
grows labored.
